newsitem.headline: Fire Bird Designs on Google Plus
newsitem.text: Fire Bird Designs has a G+ Community so come join us and see everything we're talking about. https://plus.google.com/communities/107127799636840814852

newsitem.headline: Fire Bird Designs on Facebook
newsitem.text: Fire Bird Designs has a Facebook page you should come like us on and help support us by inviting your friends to like. https://www.facebook.com/Technologx2013

newsitem.headline: Enjoy our work?
newsitem.text: Please take the time to rate Fire Bird Designs on Google Play and share it with friends that may like our work. We're always coming up with something new and doing giveaways so why miss your chance or let someone else miss theirs.
